Recipe.title: Rice Krispy Treats
Recipe.Source: From the Rice Krispies web siteRice Krispies web site
Recipe.Description: These are great for a change-up when you are tired of cookies and similar treats. And all of the cooking is done in a pan, so you don't even have to heat up the oven.

ingredient.name: Marshmallows
ingredient.nameNote: 10 oz. Regular or 10.5 oz. Miniature; about 4 cups

section.instruction:
Prepare a 9" &vector; 9" pan by greasing it.
(The best way to do this is with cooking spray, such as Pam.)
In large saucepan melt butter over medium heat.
Add marshmallows and stir until completely melted, then remove from heat.
In a large bowl, combine Rice Krispies and melted Marshmallow mixture.
Using greased spatula, evenly press mixture into prepared 9" &vector; 9" pan.
Using a sharp knife, cut into 9 equally-sized squares.

Notes.note: CAUTION!!! Melted marshmallow mixture is very hot and sticky. It will cause nasty burns if you are not careful!

Modifications.modification: Instead of Rice Krispies, use Cocoa Krispies or Fruity Pebbles
Add some M&Ms and/or Reese's Pieces to the Rice Krispies (or Cocoa Krispies) just before adding the melted Marshmallow mixture.
